response.content: Antonio you can definitely get your money back from Udemy. I am sorry you felt this way. I am not sure if you were able to get to the practice sections. I have a project and multiple GitHub examples. This is a course that assumes some proficiency with coding and I am sorry if that was not very clear. Thanks for your feedback.

results.content: There are no courses on udemy that succinctly go over explaining in a step by step manner deploying API's on AWS,but Manish has done it with this course. He has done a great job with the tutorials in the course. I can finally use my coding chops to deploy using the AWS components. Highly recommended!!
